body: Can you post the full traceback?

Sorry, Sure.

Traceback (most recent call last):

    chunksize=chunksize)

    self._process_subheader(subheader_index, pointer)

    processor(offset, length)

  File "C:\Users\Jason\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\io\sas\sas7bdat.py", line 585, in _process_format_subheader
    col.ctype = self.column_types[current_column_number]

IndexError: index 1 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 1`

@binaryc0de : Would it be possible to share such a file in the issue?  You can upload it as a `.txt` file on GitHub if you like.  That would make it easier for people to contribute or debug this issue (i.e. they can just download the file instead of having to go through the steps of creating one).

Will mark with `Needs Info` for that purpose.
@binaryc0de : Thanks!  I moved your file uploads to the issue description.  I'll take a look.
@binaryc0de : Finally got around to this...I can't reproduce this issue.  I can in read the file just fine.  Can you provide the output from `pd.show_versions` ?

Same issue:
